answerText: Restoration Comedy[10] In his famed diaries, this Englishman described attending many Restoration dramas. Those diaries also provide an account of the "wonderful" year 1666.
heading: DRAGOON |2013 | 10 | 20 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This style of play includes The Country Wife by William Wycherley. For 10 points each: [10] Name this style of late 17th century English theatre, which is characterized by burlesque. It is named for the time period after which Charles II ascended to the throne.
